description:

description:

As fans can see below, The Odyssey is an unprecedented adaptation of the iconic epic created by Homer and set around eighth century BCE. This is all visible in the new trailer for The Odyssey shared below. Matt Damon stars in [...]

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
It’s been confirmed in a devastating announcement that actor James Ransone, whose acting credits include films like IT: Chapter Two and The Black Phone, has died at age 46. It’s been confirmed that Ransone committed suicide in Los Angeles. This is a sad day for fans of Ransone, in addition to his friends and family. [...]

The post ‘IT: Chapter Two’ & ‘The Wire’ Star James Ransone Dead At 46 appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘IT: Chapter Two’ & ‘The Wire’ Star James Ransone Dead At 46
